   Amy Sherman
   By Amy Sherman September 11, 2014

Charlie Crist says Rick Scott supports employers denying women birth control

   Charlie Crist’s most recent TV attack labels Republican Gov.

One of the claims in the ad is that Scott "thinks employers should be able
   to deny women coverage for birth control."

Our ruling

   Crist’s ad states that Scott "thinks employers should be able to deny
   women coverage for birth control."
